songs.title: Easy
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Drake]
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah

[Pre-Chorus: Drake]
Champagne with breakfast while I'm yawning
You can't drink all day if you don't start in the morning
Lord forgive me, I can't take things slowly (Slow)
I'm gone on them once I get going (Gone on them, oh, gone on them)

[Chorus 1: Drake]
She tryna take it all off for me
Tryna stay real close to me (Close)
I gotta catch myself
I can't play myself, I need to take it

[Refrain: Drake]
Easy, easy, easy, easy
Easy, easy, easy, easy

[Verse 1: Drake]
Railiza, you need a... money and visa
And you get what you want, always from me
I can't say "No" when you say "Please," I can't say "No"
Howisha, you need a... baby with me, uh
And I'm takin' my time, just wait, don't leave
I can't say "No" when you say "Please," I can't say "No"
You wanna drink like Bajan and dance like Trini, yeah
You want a supermodel pose like mi real friend Winnie (Like mi real friend)
Yeah, vacation is done but I'm not finished, no

[Pre-Chorus: Drake & Young Thug]
Champagne with breakfast while I'm yawning (Yawning)
You can't drink all day if you don't start in the morning
Lord forgive me, I can't take things slowly (Slow)
I'm gone on them once I get going (Gone on them, gone on them, gone on them)

[Chorus 1: Drake & Young Thug]
She tryna take it all off for me (Tryna take it all off)
Tryna stay real close to me (Tryna stay real close)
I gotta catch myself (Catch myself)
I can't play myself, I need to take it

[Refrain: Drake]
Easy, easy, easy, easy
Easy, easy, easy, easy

[Verse 2: Young Thug]
I bet I never disrespect your daughter (hm)
I beg you, pardon me darling
I see you roaming, running
Work outfit on, jean jogging
Yeah, I see right through your body
You need a young man to give you guidance
She say I'm the youngest, well I treat her the nicest

[Chorus 2: Young Thug]
She tryna take it all of for me
She tryna do it, ain't call with me
She tryna stop Young Thug
I plan on fucking every girl in the world
Well I'm taking it

[Refrain: Young Thug]
Easy, easy, easy, easy
Easy, easy, easy, easy (Hmm, hmm)

[Verse 3: Young Thug]
I raise change for you
I get all my stain on you
You know I'll bang for you
Even my main know I got a thang for you
Walk down that aisle any day for you
I'll go on the main train for you
Jump when you say like a kangaroo
Crying over you like it ain't nothing new
You let me wear your watch, then I fucked your girl in it
We did jump but we were early
She was in it for the gift, for the shitfaced
I'm tryna fuck every thot in the place
But I'm taking it

[Outro: Young Thug]
Easy, easy, breezy, easy, easy
Easy, breezy, easy, easy
